Title: HtmlTextBlock for WPF
Description: HtmlTextBlock is a light-weighted WPF control that allow you to display rich text, by translating html into TextBlock.Inlines.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
HtmlTextBlock is a light-weighted WPF control that allow you to display rich text, by translating html into TextBlock.Inlines.



For more information, please see the code project article - http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/33196/WPF-Html-supported-TextBlock

Install from Nuget - https://www.nuget.org/packages/HtmlTextBlock

This is WPF only, some cleanup have been done to remove Windows Forms dependency.
